articles.description: A new Ebola outbreak has been documented in Democratic Republic of Congo, several months after an Ebola outbreak in the eastern part of the country ended.

articles.title: Just How Historic Is the Latest Covid-19 Science Meltdown? - WIRED
articles.description: Don't blame last week's journal retractions on the scary pace of the pandemic. "Once-in-a-lifetime” scandals like this seem to happen all the time.
